name: $not-started
desc: Appointment or other booking has occurred but activity has not yet begun.

name: $scheduled
desc: Activity has been started but is not yet complete.

name: $in-progress
desc: Activity was started but has temporarily ceased with an expectation of resumption at a future time.

name: $on-hold
desc: The activities have been completed (more or less) as planned.

name: $completed
desc: The activities have been ended prior to completion (perhaps even before they were started).

name: $cancelled
desc: The authoring system doesn't know the current state of the activity.
